    The Door Class stores the location of a single door on the map.

    Stores a snapshot of the game state.
    Journal
    The Journal stores relevant information to the players progress through the game.
    JournalCharacter
    Stores a reference to a character for use in the player Journal.
    MapEntity
    Base class to represent different map entities.
    MIRCH
    MIRCH is used to generate all graphics in the program.
    Prop
